Name: OldGopher_Pipe
Description:
With the Pipes mod, you can connect multiple water tanks or ponds without needing power, using only water pressure.
You can also use valves to control the maximum water level and to raise the water to different levels, try using the water pump.
Take a look and enjoy the game!

What's in this set:
* water pump
* pipe valve
* vertical connecting pipes
* different types of horizontal pipes and connections
